N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6661.5 - Reports

State Regulations
(a) Each grantee
receiving payments hereunder shall submit to the Office, by such time as the

Office shall specify and following guidelines prepared by the Office, a report
which shall include: (1)
the manner in which
grant payments were expended; (2)
a
description of the scope, status and quality of the project funded; (3)
the extent to which the combined center
reduced expenditures or realized savings; (4)
the impact and effectiveness of this
program in meeting the community's needs for senior citizen services, residential health care and child day care and the social benefit the combined
center provided to the children and senior citizens in the program; (5)
the extent to which the combined center
coordinated services with other community services; (6)
the manner in which all available
reimbursement for services has been sought, and the manner in which such
reimbursement was expended; and
(7)
such other information as the Office shall require. (b) The Office shall incorporate a summary of
the reports required by subdivision (a) of this section and incorporate them
into an annual report, including recommendations for legislation, which shall
be submitted to the Governor and the Legislature by the conclusion of each

State fiscal year for which funds are available. Notes
